duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct and indirect patient care services meeting the psychosocial, physical, and general aspects of care under the supervision of a Registered Nurse.
Meet the communication needs of the patient and family.

education_certification.credential: Current and valid license as a Licensed Vocational Nurse issued by the State of California.
BCLS upon hire and maintain current.
ACLS upon hire and maintain current.
Minimum one-year experience in an Acute Care Medical-Surgical setting preferred.
